name: 量子力學（一）
comment: 僅限本系已修過量子力學(一)但未獲取學分之學生
restrict: ◎第一階段需人工加選◎第二階段需人工加選◎加退選階段需人工加選 ◎課程開放上修
goals: To learn about the development and theories of quantum mechanics
To improve the thinking skill in physics
Introduction of a core course of modern physics
syllabus:
**Term I: (Textbook Chapter 1-4)**

Fundamentals of Quantum Mechanics

Quantum Dynamics

Angular Momentum and Spin

Symmetry  (if time allows, or will be discussed in term II)

**Term II: (Textbook Chapter 5-7)**

Approximation Methods

Scattering Theory

Identical Particles
prerequisite: ◎First phase of courses enrollment: Course enrollment by manual◎Second phase of courses enrollment: Course enrollment by manual◎Add/Drop period: Course enrollment by manual ◎Available for junior and senior year B.A. program students (Doctoral program courses excepted) and M.A. program students.
